content: a moment with muriel prayer shawl my mother muriel is a wonderful knitter she loves making prayer shawls and has done hundreds for the rehoboth congregational church in my home state of massachusetts mom enjoys making the traditional knit 3 pearl 3 pattern so this pattern uses those traditional stitches with a little twist to make them stand out more i enjoy repeating a little mantra when i knit the three stitches such as peace love joy it makes knitting the shawl more meaningful for both myself and the recipient may a moment with muriel bring you hours of peaceful knitting materials yarn - 800 yards of a bulky yarn preferably easy care needles - us size 10 5 optional - two stitch markers pattern can be made wider by adding stitches in increments of 6 optional add a stitch marker after first 4 and before last 4 stitches to delineate garter stitch border directions using 10 5 needles and bulky yarn cast on 77 stitches knit 8 row in garter stitch for border start pattern pattern row1 k4 *k3 p3 repeat from * to last 7 stitches k7 row 2 k4 purl to last 4 stitches k4 row 3 k4 *p3 k3 repeat from * to last 7 stitches p3 k4 row 4 repeat row 2 repeat these four row until shawl is 58 5 inches from cast on edge knit eight row cast off loosely block and enjoy optional attach fringe in same yarn used or one of a complimentary color i use three strands of yarn attached every other stitch pattern by kerri williams
